title: Tenzan No Miko Sonin - Ochikobore No Miko Ga Oukyuu Ni Haitte Kuni Wo Sukutta Ue Ni Oujitachi Ni Aisaretemasu
alternative_title: 天山の巫女ソニン～落ちこぼれの巫女が王宮に入って国を救った上に王子たちに愛されてます～ ; Tianshan Priestess Sonin - A Fallen Shrine Maiden Enters the Royal Palace and Saves the Country and Is Loved by the Princes
status: 天山の巫女ソニン～落ちこぼれの巫女が王宮に入って国を救った上に王子たちに愛されてます～ ; Tianshan Priestess Sonin - A Fallen Shrine Maiden Enters the Royal Palace and Saves the Country and Is Loved by the Princes
description:
Description :
        Sonin was sent to Tenzan to become a priestess at an early age.But one day, at the age of 12, she was judged to have no talent as a priestess and was sent home!One day, after returning to her village and making friends, she finds a lost item belonging to a prince and is asked to deliver it to him, but she is unexpectedly recruited by the royal court!A failed priestess saves the prince and her country in this Asian fantasy!

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1: Sonin Descends From The Mountain
